import React, {useEffect} from 'react' import Navbar from './navbar' import { useParams } from 'react-router' const Preview = () => { const { code } = useParams(); useEffect(() => { axios.get(`${Baseurl}coursedetails`, { params: { code: code } }).then((res) => { if (res.data) { setDetails(res.data.details) setSections(res.data.sections) setLname(res.data.lname) setNumber(res.data.no) } }) }, []) return ( <>
📺 Playing, Best regards!
📚 Course Sections

Course Overview

) } export default Preview
